text: Jilin University (; often abbreviated JLU or 吉大) is a national university. China's Ministry of Education controls the university directly. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jilin University (English) * Jilin University Official Application Online Site Category:Colleges and universities in the People's Republic of China Category:1946 establishments in Asia Category:1940s establishments in China Category:Jilin
title: Jilin University
